name: Genesis (itch) (r0gue96)
description:
Welcome to the world of Alinon. In this world there were

many races. However in the year 1403 the humans had

driven most races into hiding or extinction.

The kingdom of Alexandria is the Highest form of

government in the world deciding the laws and in charge

of deploying guards to towns and villages. Alexandria

is ruled by the new king Cyrus said to be the strongest

man in the world. His king's guard is among the most

skilled in the world. Since the start of his rule king

Cyrus has ended the witch hunts, which has done nothing

to stop the people's resentment in most nations.

Four years ago mysterious dungeons opened up in Alinon

exposing the world to this new substance "Mana" and

releasing monsters of varying sizes and magics. After the

dungeons opened everyone and everything was exposed to the

mana released. However some living things reacted

differently than others. They were deemed mages, because

unlike everything else exposed they produced more mana.

No one is sure what is at the end of these dungeons. But

rumors of an event called the Genesis will appear.

Please check out my patreon for up to date Information on my progress.

Patreon.com/R0gue96
